name: addConversationTopic
description: Adds a conversation topic to the game for a number of days (default 1).

name: addFloorProp
description: Adds a floor prop object at the specified tile.

name: addLargeTerrainFeature
description: Adds a large terrain feature (like bushes) at the specified tile.

name: addLantern
description: Adds a lantern light source.

name: addMail
description: Adds mail to the player's mailbox.

name: addMailReceived
description: Marks a mail ID as received (without sending mail).

name: addObject
description: Adds a world object at the specified tile.

name: addQuest
description: Adds a quest to the player's journal.

name: addTemporaryActor
description: Spawns a temporary actor/NPC for the event.

name: addTerrainFeature
description: Adds a terrain feature (like trees, flooring) at the specified tile.

name: ambientLight
description: Sets the ambient light color.

name: animate
description: Plays a specific animation sequence for an NPC.

name: awardFestivalPrize
description: Gives the player the main prize for the current festival.

name: beginSimultaneousCommand
description: Starts a block where commands run simultaneously until endSimultaneousCommand.

name: broadcast
description: Sends a command to all other players in multiplayer.

name: changeMapTile
description: Changes a tile on a specific map layer.

name: changePortrait
description: Changes the portrait used by an NPC for dialogue.

name: changeSprite
description: Changes the sprite index for an NPC.

name: changeStat
description: Changes a player stat.

name: clearTempSprites
description: Removes all temporary sprites added by 'specificTemporarySprite'.

name: continue
description: Resumes NPC movement after a 'stop' command.

name: cutscene
description: Starts another cutscene event by ID.

name: dayUpdate
description: Runs the daily update logic for the current location.

name: debug
description: Executes a debug command.

name: dialogue
description: Shows dialogue from an NPC using a key from their dialogue file.

name: doAction
description: Makes the farmer perform the action associated with the specified tile.

name: drawOffset
description: Applies a drawing offset to an NPC.

name: elliottbook
description: Initiates Elliott's book reading/writing sequence.

name: emote
description: Makes an NPC show an emote bubble.

name: end
description: Ends the current event.

name: endBehavior
description: Seems related to ending specific NPC behaviors or states initiated by the event.

name: endDialogue
description: Closes the dialogue box for the specified NPC.

name: endSimultaneousCommand
description: Ends a block of simultaneous commands.

name: event
description: Starts another event by ID.

name: faceDirection
description: Makes an NPC face a specific direction (0=up, 1=right, 2=down, 3=left).

name: fadeIn
description: Fades the screen in from black.

name: fadeOut
description: Fades the screen out to black.

name: farmer
description: Warps the farmer and sets their sprite/facing direction.

name: farmerAnimation
description: Plays a specific farmer animation.

name: farmerEat
description: Makes the farmer eat the specified item.

name: farmerMotion
description: Sets the farmer's sprite to a specific motion frame.

name: farmerSit
description: Makes the farmer sit down.

name: fade
description: Fades the screen (defaults to fade out).

name: festivalDialogue
description: Shows dialogue using a key from the current festival's dialogue file.

name: finish
description: Marks the event as finished (similar to 'end' but might have subtle differences).

name: fishing
description: Makes an NPC start fishing.

name: fork
description: Starts a parallel event that runs alongside the current one.

name: friendship
description: Adds or removes friendship points with an NPC.

name: globalFade
description: Globally fades the screen to black.

name: globalFadeToClear
description: Globally fades the screen back to clear.

name: glow
description: Makes an NPC glow with a specific color.

name: grabObject
description: Makes an NPC pick up an object.

name: grandpa
description: Initiates Grandpa's evaluation sequence.

name: halt
description: Stops all character movement and the camera.

name: harvey
description: Seems specific to a Harvey event sequence, possibly involving dialogue.

name: holdUpItem
description: Makes an NPC hold up an item.

name: hospital
description: Puts the specified NPC in the hospital bed.

name: ignoreMovementPause
description: Allows NPC movement commands to continue even if the event is paused.

name: ignoreWeddings
description: Likely prevents wedding events from triggering during this event.

name: itemAboveHead
description: Shows an item bouncing above an NPC's head.

name: jump
description: Makes an NPC jump.

name: loadActors
description: Loads standard actors/NPCs for the current location.

name: lockDoor
description: Locks a door tile.

name: mailReceive
description: Adds a mail ID to the player's received letters.

name: makeInvisible
description: Makes a rectangular area of the map invisible.

name: message
description: Shows a simple message box with the specified text.

name: minedeath
description: Triggers the mine death sequence.

name: money
description: Adds/removes money (or sets absolute amount).

name: monsters
description: Spawns specified monsters.

name: move
description: Moves an NPC a number of tiles.

name: name
description: Likely related to naming something (pet? child?).

name: noresponse
description: Prevents an NPC from responding to clicks/interaction.

name: npc
description: Adds or repositions an NPC for the event.

name: offset
description: Applies a temporary positional offset to an NPC.

name: pause
description: Pauses the event for a duration.

name: perfectDeity
description: Initiates the Statue of Perfection sequence.

name: playSound
description: Plays a sound effect by ID.

name: position
description: Instantly sets an NPC's tile position.

name: positionOffset
description: Applies a persistent positional offset to an NPC (differs from 'offset'?).

name: proceed
description: Allows a halted character (usually the farmer) to move again.

name: question
description: Shows a question dialogue box with multiple choice answers.

name: quit
description: Immediately exits the event (force quit?).

name: removeFloorProp
description: Removes a floor prop at the specified tile.

name: removeItem
description: Removes an item from the player's inventory.

name: removeLargeTerrainFeature
description: Removes a large terrain feature at the specified tile.

name: removeObject
description: Removes a world object at the specified tile.

name: removeQuest
description: Removes a quest from the player's journal.

name: removeSprite
description: Removes an NPC/actor from the event.

name: removeTemporaryActor
description: Removes a temporary actor added by 'addTemporaryActor'.

name: removeTerrainFeature
description: Removes a terrain feature at the specified tile.

name: removeTile
description: Removes a tile from a specific map layer.

name: rename
description: Temporarily renames an NPC for the event.

name: resetVariable
description: Purpose unclear, likely resets some internal state for an NPC.

name: restore
description: Likely restores some game state previously modified by the event.

name: screenFlash
description: Flashes the screen with a specified color and alpha.

name: script
description: Executes an event script (seems internal or deprecated).

name: secretNote
description: Shows a specific secret note.

name: seen
description: Marks an event ID as seen by the player.

name: setRunning
description: Sets the running state for an NPC (or farmer if name omitted).

name: setvisible
description: Makes an invisible tile visible again.

name: shake
description: Makes an NPC's sprite shake.

name: showFrame
description: Sets an NPC's sprite to a specific animation frame.

name: showItems
description: Purpose unclear, possibly related to displaying items in a shop or festival context.

name: showKiss
description: Shows the kissing animation with the specified NPC.

name: showToolUpgrade
description: Shows the tool upgrade animation for the specified tool.

name: shuffleMine
description: Resets/shuffles a specific mine level.

name: sit
description: Makes an NPC sit down (optionally at a specific location).

name: skippable
description: Makes the current event skippable.

name: playSound
description: Plays a sound effect, optionally only for the local player.

name: speak
description: Shows dialogue spoken by an NPC using the provided text directly.

name: specificTemporarySprite
description: Adds a temporary animated sprite effect (like explosions, sparkles).

name: speed
description: Sets the movement speed for an NPC.

name: stop
description: Stops the movement of the NPC specified in the last 'move' command.

name: stopAdvancedMoves
description: Stops complex movement sequences (details unclear).

name: stopAnimation
description: Stops the current animation for an NPC, optionally setting a final frame.

name: stopBaby
description: Stops the baby animation/state.

name: stopFishing
description: Makes an NPC stop fishing.

name: stopMusic
description: Stops the currently playing music.

name: switchEvent
description: Switches to a different event immediately.

name: temporaryAnimatedSprite
description: Adds a temporary animated sprite effect with many customization options.

name: textAboveHead
description: Shows text in a bubble above an NPC's head.

name: time
description: Sets the current time of day.

name: toss
description: Makes an NPC appear to be tossed towards a tile.

name: unlockDoor
description: Unlocks a door tile.

name: up
description: Likely related to making the farmer stand up if sitting.

name: viewport
description: Moves the camera viewport to center on a specific tile.

name: viewportFreeze
description: Freezes the camera viewport in its current position.

name: waitFor
description: Pauses the event until a specific condition is met (e.g., 'waitFor Mover', 'waitFor TemporarySprite').

name: waitForOtherPlayers
description: Pauses the event until all players reach this command.

name: warp
description: Instantly warps an NPC to a specific tile.

name: warpFarmer
description: Warps the farmer to a new location and tile.

name: wedding
description: Initiates the wedding ceremony.

name: witch
description: Initiates the witch event sequence.
